text: "Bored" is a song by American singer-songwriter Billie Eilish that was later included on the 13 Reasons Why soundtrack. The song received a music video on June 26, 2017. The song shows a relationship with someone who is disrespectful and doesn't care about anyone's feelings or needs. Billie tried to change their ways, but her attempts were in vain. ==Music video== The music video for this song was released on June 26, 2017. It features Eilish in a blue outfit, dancing around a long ladder with speakers. ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from Tidal. * Billie Eilish – vocals, songwriter * Finneas O'Connell – producer, songwriter * Aron Forbes – songwriter * Tim Anderson – songwriter ==Charts== ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Portugal (AFP) | 1183 |} ==Certifications== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label ! scope="col"| |- ! scope="row" rowspan=""| Various | rowspan=""| March 30, 2017 | | | |} ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Billie Eilish songs Category:Interscope Records singles Category:Song recordings produced by Finneas O'Connell Category:Songs written by Billie Eilish Category:Songs written by Finneas O'Connell
title: Bored (song)
